/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and pedestrians add to the dynamic nature of the scene, suggesting a city that is always on the move. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
